-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                              General Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type.................: Game		|
Platform.............: Windows   	|
Crack................: Included	 	|
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
RollerCoaster Tycoon (or often abbreviated RCT) is a series of computer games 
that simulate amusement park management. Each game in the series challenges 
players with open-ended amusement park management and development, and also 
allows players to construct and customize their own unique roller coasters.
The first game of the series was developed by designer and programmer Chris 
Sawyer, artist Simon Foster and composer Allister Brimble. It was published by 
Hasbro Interactive (which was sold to Infogrames, and is now known as Atari). 
The game was a sleeper hit. It spawned two sequels and several expansion packs.

As operating systems continued to develop some users of Windows 2000, Windows XP,
and Windows Vista found trouble when running the first and second game. For 
example, when a user's computer clock adjusted itself for Daylight Saving Time, 
all scenarios that were previously unlocked would be locked again.

This is a new Release of all three RollerCoaster Tycoon games, and their expansions. 
While the original release and many other releases did contain all the necessary 
files for a clean install of RollerCoaster Tycoon, they were flawed by many 
critical Vista installation and playability problems, stability issues, 
audio-video problems, and poor documentation. By converting the content to a 
portable format, providing working cracks, scripting hacks, better documentation, 
and including the Official and Unofficial  patches, these issues have been resolved. 
Unnecessary content was also removed from this release, reducing the size of the 
three games collectively by a third while retaining all functionality.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                              Miscellaneous Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please Note The Following:

.I.
The Federation takes no responsibility for any damage that may come to your 
computer through the trial of this game. This mod has been tested to work 
on Windows XP and Vista. No support or technical assistance will be provided. 
Ever. Creation of this release took many hours of unpaid labour. 
.II.
The Federation utilized a scripting/registry methodology to crack the first and
second games as an attempt to hack the archaic binaries these games utilize would
require a knowledge of archaic cracking which predates all Federation members. 
.III.
The Federation disassembled the "D" patch to resolve many of the issues plaguing 
other related releases. This patch was made by members of the RollerCoaster
Tycoon community (alt.game.rct) who neither support nor condone piracy. The 
Federation released their work without their permission.
.IV.
To all the Fans, Friends, Foes, Members and Affiliates, of the FEDERATION:

			-----------------------
			|THANKS FOR EVERYTHING| 
                        -----------------------

Because of you we are "STILL UNDERGROUND" and "STILL ALIVE".
[54686f73652057686f204b6e6f772055732043616e2046696e64205573]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Install Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Steps:

(1.) Extract the "RollerCoaster Tycoon - Ultimate.rar" file to a directory of 
your choice and then Navigate to the extracted directory (by default this is 
the "RollerCoaster Tycoon" directory). Double-click on the binary/executable
whose name corresponds with the desired game.

Note: This release is portable and therefore the binaries/executables within 
make no changes to the game/system files which are already updated, modded, 
and cracked.


Shortcut Information:

"ROLLERCOASTER TYCOON ONE"             - RollerCoaster Tycoon One Gameplay
"ROLLERCOASTER TYCOON TWO"             - RollerCoaster Tycoon Two Gameplay
"ROLLERCOASTER TYCOON THREE"           - RollerCoaster Tycoon Three Gameplay

Note: The official manuals, and covers are located in the ".Extras" directory.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                  In The Pipeline
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
T-BOX - ZKZ of the Federation Team

Games - Pending
EMUs  - Complete
NFO   - Pending
Test  - Complete

This release is imminent. This project seeks to combine a Lite (less than 700m)
Vista build, bootscreen, frontend, registry tweaks, several related 
applications, twenty-plus emulators and tens of thousands of various game 
images and ROMS in an orderly package. This package would then allow a user 
to easily create a SF personal computer (or any other light PC) that would 
act as any console from the first to sixth generation. This has been a huge
undertaking but if it is successful this project will provide the PC scene with 
the first real replacement for consoles. Please understand that projects like 
this one can have unsuspected kinks. Please be patient.

FarCry Co-op - BHD UPDATE*

Game  - Complete
Crack - Complete
NFO   - Pending
Mod   - Complete
Test  - Complete - Loads of Fun

This update will include the Black Hawk Down Assault Co-op mini mod made for 
FarCry. It will be released when time can be found for basic testing and the 
writing of a noob-friendly NFO.

Quake 4 Ultimate Co-op - Opencoop

Game  - Pending
Crack - Pending
NFO   - Pending
Mod   - Pending
Test  - Pending

As many of you know opencoop recently released a tech demo of their next 
project Quake 4 Co-op which allows you to traverse most of the levels, with 
large amounts of lag, glitches, and crashes. Once they have a clean version working, this Crack-Mod will be released. Because we are waiting for them to 
finish their work there is no release date.
